description: Description:* The button is made of Metal.* It's polished and enamel painted.* It's very comfortable to press on the button.* The screw thread is carefully designed and tested.* It fits the cameras with screw hole on the shutter release button such as Leica M rangefinder cameras include film M3 M6 MP, digital M8 M9 M9P etc.; SLR cameras like most Nikon, Canon, Hasselblad, Olympus, Minolta, Rolleiflex, FUJIX100 SLR cameras.Package Contents1x Concave Metal Soft Shutter Release Button
title: Neewer® 10MM Diameter Metal Soft Shutter Release Button for Leica Fujifilm X100 Cameras With Tapered Thread Mouth (Silver Concave)
